section: CRC_CHECKSUM.h Go to the documentation of this file.1 // 2 // Created by Rendszergazda on 11/24/2025. 3 // 4 5 #ifndef DEFLATE_CRC_CHECKSUM_H 6 #define DEFLATE_CRC_CHECKSUM_H 7 8 // The standard polynomial used for Gzip/Zlib (IEEE 802.3) 9 #define CRC32_POLYNOMIAL 0xEDB88320UL 10 11 // The initial value for the CRC32 calculation in Gzip/Zlib is 0xFFFFFFFF 12 #define CRC32_INITIAL_VALUE 0xFFFFFFFFUL 13 #include <stdint.h> 14 24 extern uint32_t calculate_crc32(uint32_t current_crc, const uint8_t* data, size_t length); 25 26 #endif //DEFLATE_CRC_CHECKSUM_H
